description: Try our easy to follow Garlic & Lime Beef With Sesame Fries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlic & Lime Beef With Sesame Fries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g red washed potatoes, cut into 1cm-thick fries
1 bunch baby cos leaves, to serve (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place potato on trays. Drizzle over half the oil and add 2 garlic cloves and half the sesame seeds. Season and toss to coat. Bake for 40 minutes or until fries are tender and golden.
Meanwhile, drizzle remaining oil over beef. Scatter three-quarters of onion, remaining garlic and zest over beef. Using the back of a spoon, rub lime and onion into beef to release their flavours.
When fries have 15 minutes of cooking time left, heat a chargrill pan over high heat. Cook beef for 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate to rest.
Cook tomatoes in chargrill pan for 3 minutes or until starting to blister, then set aside. Cook lime, cut-sides down, for 2 minutes or until charred.
Thickly slice beef and transfer to a serving platter. Scatter over remaining onion and sesame seeds, squeeze over lime juice and serve with fries, tomatoes and cos leaves.
